    <h2 id="autogen.cache.abstract_cache_base.AbstractCache" class="doc doc-heading">
        <code class="doc-symbol doc-symbol-heading doc-symbol-class"></code>
        <span class="doc doc-object-name doc-class-name">AbstractCache</span>
        <a href="#autogen.cache.abstract_cache_base.AbstractCache" class="headerlink" title="Permanent link"></a>
    </h2>

```python
AbstractCache(*args, **kwargs)
```

    This protocol defines the basic interface for cache operations.
    Implementing classes should provide concrete implementations for
    these methods to handle caching mechanisms.

<b>Parameters:</b>
| Name | Description |
|--|--|
| `*args` |  |
| `**kwargs` |  |

### Instance Methods

<code class="doc-symbol doc-symbol-heading doc-symbol-method"></code>
#### close
<a href="#autogen.cache.abstract_cache_base.AbstractCache.close" class="headerlink" title="Permanent link"></a>

```python
close(self) -> None
```

    Close the cache. Perform any necessary cleanup, such as closing network connections or
    releasing resources.

<br />

<code class="doc-symbol doc-symbol-heading doc-symbol-method"></code>
#### get
<a href="#autogen.cache.abstract_cache_base.AbstractCache.get" class="headerlink" title="Permanent link"></a>

```python
get(
    self,
    key: str,
    default: Any | None = None
) -> Any | None
```

    Retrieve an item from the cache.

<b>Parameters:</b>
| Name | Description |
|--|--|
| `key` | The key identifying the item in the cache.<br/><br/>**Type:** `str` |
| `default` | The default value to return if the key is not found.<br/><br/>Defaults to None.<br/><br/>**Type:** `Any \| None`<br/><br/>**Default:** None |

<b>Returns:</b>
| Type | Description |
|--|--|
| `Any \| None` | The value associated with the key if found, else the default value. |

<br />

<code class="doc-symbol doc-symbol-heading doc-symbol-method"></code>
#### set
<a href="#autogen.cache.abstract_cache_base.AbstractCache.set" class="headerlink" title="Permanent link"></a>

```python
set(
    self,
    key: str,
    value: Any
) -> None
```

    Set an item in the cache.

<b>Parameters:</b>
| Name | Description |
|--|--|
| `key` | The key under which the item is to be stored.<br/><br/>**Type:** `str` |
| `value` | The value to be stored in the cache.<br/><br/>**Type:** `Any` |

<br />
